about_the_game:
Today is the long-awaited hero exam. Lucius, a young man waiting to be recognised by the inhabitants of Greece has been expecting this day. However, due to a terrible nightmare of his missing hero brother, Lucius is running late for the exam!
Luckily, the wannabe hero arrives just in time for the test. Not that luckily, he dies as he is about to reach the end. The might god Zeus takes pity on him. Granting Lucius the power of immortality.

GAMEPLAY

Experience the heart-pounding action of 'Maze of Gods ' a thrilling platform game set in the Ancient Greece. Navigate lush forests and treacherous dungeons as you uncover ancient secrets and face formidable foes.
Master the combat style, using your sword and shield, and unlock abilities to progress and discover new places. Solve intricate puzzles to unlock hidden passages and collect rare treasures.
Engage with a rich cast of characters that shape your journey. With stunning visuals and an immersive soundtrack, 'Maze of Gods' offers a challenging adventure.

FEATURES

  • Journey through 5 Immersive zones in a breathtaking world inspired by Greek Mythology brimming with secrets, hidden areas, and alternate paths to discover.
  • Master 6 new abilities to unlock previously inaccessible regions, enriching your exploration experience.
  • Engage in strategic battles against 6 formidable bosses, employing skill-based sword and shield tactics to gain the upper hand.
  • Solve at least 4 different puzzles challenges that demand wit and skill, unraveling the story and uncovering hidden secrets.
  • Gather coins and seek out 15 hidden stars in total to earn valuable rewards and enhance your journey.
  • Enjoy humorous dialogues filled with a distinct touch of humour, adding charm and light-heartedness to interactions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: In a world inspired by ancient Greek myths, a mediocre aspiring hero gets a second chance at life from Zeus. Lucius will explore an open 2D world, face creatures, solve puzzles and unlock skills. In his quest, he will earn the respect of the village and become a legend… or a legendary failure
